summary: This document is an email chain from January 2021 between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York discussing the search for saved emails related to Jeffrey Epstein on a shared drive. The emails indicate a handoff between personnel and uncertainty about whether specific emails regarding Epstein were preserved.

events.title: Email inquiry about Epstein-related emails
events.description: An AUSA emails colleagues to inquire if a predecessor (M.) saved emails related to Jeffrey Epstein on a shared drive for trafficking cases.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Prosecutors in the SDNY were searching for saved emails related to Jeffrey Epstein in January 2021.
The search involved checking a 'trafficking share drive' and concerned emails saved by a predecessor, M.
There was uncertainty about whether M. saved any emails related to Epstein, indicating potential gaps in record-keeping during personnel transitions.
